title: FieldUniformityEvaluation
description: This describes the procedure that was used to measure the Field dependent variations in the pixel-to-pixel sensitivity of the detector and/or by distortions in the optical path.

subCategoriesOrder.FieldUniformityEvaluation: This describes the procedure that was used to measure the Field dependent variations in the pixel-to-pixel sensitivity of the detector and/or by distortions in the optical path.
subCategoriesOrder.FlatFieldImage: This is an empty element that refers to an Image obtained from a Standard Slide designed to eavluate the Field of View (FOV) dependent variations in the pixel-to-pixel sensitivity of the detector and/or by distortions in the Optical Path.

ID.description: A Unique Identifier for this component.

MaxIntensityPixelXCoordinate.description: This field reports the x-axis coordinate of the Pixel that has the Maximum Intensity in the Image used for this Flat Field Calibration procedure.

MaxIntensityPixelYCoordinate.description: This field reports the y-axis coordinate of the Pixel that has the Maximum Intensity in the Image used for this Flat Field Calibration procedure.

MeanMaxtoCornerIntensityRatio.description: This field reports the Mean between the Ratios obtained by comparing the Maximum Pixel Intensity and the Intensities of the four corner Pixels of the Image used for this Flat Field Calibration procedure.

SDMaxtoCornerIntensityRatio.description: This field reports the Standard Deviation between the Ratios obtained by comparing the Maximum Pixel Intensity and the Intensities of the four corner Pixels of the Image used for this Flat Field Calibration procedure.

items.description: This is an empty element that refers to an Image obtained from a Standard Slide designed to eavluate the Field of View (FOV) dependent variations in the pixel-to-pixel sensitivity of the detector and/or by distortions in the Optical Path.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
